answers.answer: I have my screen within the next couple of weeks too.. I am moving back to the States on next Thursday.. so i will set up all my appointments then!  Im glad that you are doing much better now.. I am doing better too! I am nervous about our international flight next week, but Im sure whatever happens I will survive it!  Last flight I threw the whole time... but that was during my first trimester.  Keep the updates coming! ~Amy

I have my test on the 29th. I am a little nervous..don't know why..I don't think I have anything to worry about but the last time I went in to have them take my blood it took them 3 pokes to get anything and they are going to take my blood twice..BOOBut on a good note little beaner is still as wiggly as ever!Good luck with your tests! :D

My test is Friday...at the end of the day..ARGH!  So, no sugar all day!!!!!Had a new u/s tech yesterday and she was not very familiar with the machine so she could not tell me much...that really irritated me since the last two u/s checks did not get recorded on video..ARGH!!!!!

question: Well ladies....Im doing well for 25 wks.  I honestly started showing like 3 wks ago!! I dont know what happened....I sort of just popped. I took my diabetes screening test today and the results will be back tommorrow. Im feeling pretty good my energy levels are high.  Its been between 97-107 every day here and Ive been swelling non stop.  I cant believe all of us are moving into the 3rd trimester over the coming weeks....seems amazing how fast the time has flown by!!! Im glad to see everyone is doing well!  I just wanted to drop a line with an update!Ericka
title: Appt update.....diabetes screening
